name: ons-inspire.esriuk.com/arcgis/services
description: Official data catalog on ArcGIS Online, managed as part of Esri UK's National Data Service, which provides structured, navigable, and downloadable statistics and indicators for various geographies and time periods. The catalog is typically used within ArcGIS Online environments and provides access to feature services for multiple themes.
owner_name: Esri UK National Data Service (on behalf of ONS or possibly other public bodies)
